title: Hey Riot Broporo
body:
You seem to be on here a lot, think you could help me? I'm a Yorick main and I'm trying to see who I can talk to about some ideas I have for a skin, I'm planning on making a post to the skins board but I also really would love to be able to speak to someone who may have some sway on an eventual skin, think you can hook me up?

P.S. Broporo is an amazing name

replies.body:
Oooooh man, if I had any sway on skins we'd have a lot more Illaoi skins that's for sure xD!

I don't have too much input on what skins are being developed, but if you have any ideas we love hearing them! Like you said this isn't quite the right board for it, so go ahead post your idea over in Concepts & Creations and I'll be sure to look for it there!!

P.S. Thanks for the name props!!! I actually formed this name from another alter-ego Brocobo (which itself was borrowed from Chocobo ^_^!)

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=yydhpEpf,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-21T01:06:14.828+0000)
>
> Oooooh man, if I had any sway on skins we'd have a lot more Illaoi skins that's for sure xD!
> 
> I don't have too much input on what skins are being developed, but if you have any ideas we love hearing them! Like you said this isn't quite the right board for it, so go ahead post your idea over in Concepts & Creations and I'll be sure to look for it there!!
> 
> P.S. Thanks for the name props!!! I actually formed this name from another alter-ego Brocobo (which itself was borrowed from Chocobo ^_^!)

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/huIva7d5-yorick-ultimate-skin here's the post by the way, just saying if you run into anyone who may have some say do me a solid and let them know #desperateYorickmain

P.S. I LOVE CHOCOBOS!

Wark! Welcome to being an honorary Chocobro ^_^!

I love the whole evolving-look-when-you-buy-items idea! I think something like that could be hella cool if done right. Like I said, I can't make any promises, but I'll do my best to show this off to whoever I can =D!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=yydhpEpf,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-05-21T03:12:22.383+0000)
>
> Wark! Welcome to being an honorary Chocobro ^_^!
> 
> I love the whole evolving-look-when-you-buy-items idea! I think something like that could be hella cool if done right. Like I said, I can't make any promises, but I'll do my best to show this off to whoever I can =D!

*Checks become a chocobo off bucket list*
AS A YORICK MAIN I APPROVE
